thread.title: Sue Andrews/CLC Restaurants
thread.title_full: Notepads Your Way reviewed by Sue Andrews/CLC Restaurants

author: Sue Andrews/CLC Restaurants
title: Sue Andrews/CLC Restaurants
text: Our Company needed so personalized graph paper pads and I was looking for a better price than our last printer. I found Notepads Your Way on the internet and gave them a call. I had a proof in a few hours and I got a color logo for the same price as the black and white we had before! Also, we got 50 pads for LESS money than 25 from the previous company. After I approved the proof and paid, we received our order in under five days. I can't say enough about the quality either.
